summary: This is an email from June 18, 2008, discussing a call to attorney Roy Black and the approval of an immunity request for a person described as a 'New York victim/recruiter' in the Epstein case. The email is addressed to multiple recipients and concerns the logistics of sending the immunity request.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: A call was placed to him regarding the Epstein case, but he was 'unavailable.'

events.title: Immunity Request Approved
events.description: An immunity request for an individual described as a 'New York victim/recruiter' in the Epstein case was approved.

keyFacts: An immunity request for a 'New York victim/recruiter' in the Epstein case was approved as of June 18, 2008.
Attorney Roy Black was contacted regarding the case but was unavailable.
The email discusses sending the approved immunity request to specific recipients, whose names are not fully provided in the text.
